subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If the Yankees are able to trade Randy Johnson, they would be in position to pursue Barry Zito, setting up a possible bidding war with the Mets and dream scenario for agent Scott Boras.
snippet: If the Yankees are able to trade Randy Johnson, they would be in position to pursue Barry Zito, setting up a possible bidding war with the Mets and dream scenario for agent Scott Boras.
